name: AL HARAMAIN MUSK FLORAL
details: Elements like rose, jasmine, ylang ylang, and lily. You'll find soft, sweet notes including musk.

name: ARMAF CLUB DE NUIT INTENSE
details: A sophisticated and bold fragrance for men. Notes of lemon, black currant, apple, jasmine, and vanilla.

name: BURBERRY HER
details: A fruity and floral fragrance for women. With notes of blackcurrant, jasmine, and musk.

name: GIVENCHY GENTLEMAN
details: A classic and refined scent for men. Combines notes of lavender, iris, and patchouli.

name: VERSACE BRIGHT CRYSTAL
details: A fresh and vibrant fragrance for women. Features notes of pomegranate, peony, and musk.

name: DOLCE & GABBANA LIGHT BLUE
details: An iconic scent for women. With notes of Sicilian lemon, cedar, and apple.

name: PACO RABANNE 1 MILLION
details: A luxurious and sensual fragrance for men. Features notes of blood mandarin, cinnamon, and leather.

name: CHANEL COCO MADEMOISELLE
details: A sophisticated and elegant fragrance for women. With notes of orange, patchouli, and vetiver.

name: DIOR SAUVAGE
details: A powerful and fresh fragrance for men. Combines notes of bergamot, pepper, and ambroxan.

name: GUCCI BLOOM
details: A rich and floral scent for women. Features notes of tuberose, jasmine, and Rangoon creeper.

name: TOM FORD BLACK ORCHID
details: An opulent and sensual fragrance for both men and women. With notes of black truffle, orchid, and vanilla.

name: YVES SAINT LAURENT LA NUIT DE L'HOMME
details: A seductive and mysterious fragrance for men. Combines notes of cardamom, cedar, and coumarin.

name: CHLOÉ NOMADE
details: A modern and feminine fragrance for women. Features notes of oak moss, cherry plum, and freesia.

name: CALVIN KLEIN ETERNITY FOR MEN
details: A timeless and refreshing fragrance for men. With notes of lavender, mandarin, and sandalwood.

name: JO MALONE LIME BASIL & MANDARIN
details: A citrusy and aromatic fragrance for both men and women. Combines notes of lime, basil, and mandarin.

name: LANCOME LA VIE EST BELLE
details: A joyful and feminine fragrance for women. Features notes of iris, patchouli, and praline.

name: HUGO BOSS BOTTLED
details: A classic and masculine fragrance for men. With notes of apple, cinnamon, and vetiver.
